Room.Name: Royal Jousting Supplies
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large shop dedicated to the popular sport of jousting.
Room.LongDescription: The jouster must properly balance his lance and his horse. But in preparing for the joust, these fighters also train using various pole-type weapons, usually with strong, metal hooks and blades attached to them. A good polearm in the hands of a skilled fighter can be a deadly weapon.
